title: WTB - T206 Howie Camnitz Arms Folded PSA 1.5-3.5
author: kailes2872

posts.post_title: WTB - T206 Howie Camnitz Arms Folded PSA 1.5-3.5
posts.post_content:
In Conner's quest to complete a Pirates T206 set, he is now focused on Howie Camnitz with arms folded and has asked for it for Christmas.  I am looking for something with decent eye appeal, slabbed in an SGC or PSA holder in the 1.5-3.5 range depending on price, appeal, etc.

I have done a lot of searching on Ebay and will default to an auction if I need to - I just wanted to put something out there for the N54 crew if someone has one that they have upgraded and are looking to get rid of.

Thanks!
Kevin
Bump - if none available, I could use some guidance on a good BIN price to pay for PSA 3(ish)
For a common back... One can usually get a PSA 3 in the  $35 to $40 range auction price... BIN will be a bit more. There are a couple decent raw on eBay now for around $30.

Donnie,
Thanks so much for the feedback and insight. I was able to secure a nice SGC 35 via a board member. Conner is now well on his way to the completing his Pirates T-206 set!
